b"When holiday moments at home are more important than ever, we want to ensure that even more people can experience the joy light can bring to the holidays. b'This year, home is so important for so many. Bridger Walker, a brave young boy who shielded his sister and stood in-between her and a charging dog, shares what "home" means to him. \xe2\x80\x8b

Today, take a moment to share your own "thank you" to home with #LetterstoHome. And from the entire Lowe's family, we wish you a happy and healthy Thanksgiving! \xe2\x80\x8b

b'November is #NationalAdoptionMonth, and sweet\xc2\xa0Callen recently finalized his adoption via Zoom due to\xc2\xa0the pandemic.\xc2\xa0 

To commemorate the special occasion, his parents\xc2\xa0snapped a quick screenshot.\xc2\xa0But it was only after the\xc2\xa0call that they realized the Lowe's moving box behind\xc2\xa0Callen's head so fittingly read, "I'm home."\xc2\xa0

b'Join us in thanking our homes with your own post using #LetterstoHome and we may just surprise you with a special gift to help give back to the places that have meant so much this year. From social gatherings to social distancing, this is how @raffinee\xe2\x80\x99s home has played an important role for her family in 2020:\xe2\x80\x8b

Dear Home,\xe2\x80\x8b

Micaela and I have always felt that you\xe2\x80\x99ve been our sanctuary. And this year, more than ever- you have become so much more. You\xe2\x80\x99ve become our children\xe2\x80\x99s school, our gym and even a hub for telehealth appointments for Micaela\xe2\x80\x99s patients. More than that however, this year you have been the core of so many incredible milestones and memories. The kids started preschool in this house. Micaela completed residency and landed her first job as a surgeon in this house. I overcame my fear of spiders in this house (sort of!) Our kids graduated out of diapers in this house and have grown up before our very eyes. From the dinner parties and social gatherings, and now to the family dinners and social distancing- you\xe2\x80\x99ve been with us through it all. So to our house, our home, thank you. Thank you for working extra hard for us this year. Thank you for being a place of respite. A place of joy. A place of safety. And a place of lifelong memories. You have carried us through this year and we are so grateful for YOU!\xe2\x80\x8b

 #LetterstoHome'

b'If you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for a trick-or-treating alternative that's\xc2\xa0spooky, socially-distant and kid-approved, we\xe2\x80\x99ve got you\xc2\xa0covered! With a few simple steps, you can have grave digging\xc2\xa0for candy set up faster than you can say "boo"!\xc2\xa0 

Here\xe2\x80\x99s how you do it:\xc2\xa0 
:keycap_1:: You\xe2\x80\x99ll need some Lowe\xe2\x80\x99s buckets, potting soil, scrap wood,\xc2\xa0paint, sealable bags and lots of candy.\xc2\xa0 
:keycap_2:: Paint a DIY \xe2\x80\x9ctombstone\xe2\x80\x9d using scrap wood and any paint\xc2\xa0you have on hand.\xc2\xa0 
:keycap_3:: Fill bags with candy and seal them shut.\xc2\xa0 
:keycap_4:: Fill a bucket with potting soil and layer in bags of candy as\xc2\xa0you go.\xc2\xa0 
:keycap_5:: Top off your bucket with your DIY tombstone.\xc2\xa0 
:keycap_6:: Let your kids go \xe2\x80\x9cgrave digging\xe2\x80\x9d for candy!\xc2\xa0 
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#halloween #lowes #trickorlreat #loweshoals #halloweenathome #candy #boo #skeleton #halloweencandy'

b'As Labor Day approaches, we want you to be able to celebrate your hard-working neighbors! Instead of resting for the holiday, let\xe2\x80\x99s give back to those who deserve it most. To nominate someone special, share your stories of your amazing neighbors in the comments and we\xe2\x80\x99ll see how we can lend a hand. 

Up first: India Richardson. India plays many different roles: wife, mom, nurse. Which has meant long days and little rest during the pandemic. But her neighbor @melissachanel says her smile and positive attitude hasn\xe2\x80\x99t faltered for a second. To #BuildThanks and show her appreciation for India, Melissa surprised her with a front porch makeover so she can enjoy some well-deserved downtime with her husband and daughter.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#lowes #lowesgoals #laborday #DIY #frontporch #actsofkindness'

b'The intersection between home and style has never been more prevalent than it has this year. b'Instead of taking it easy for Labor Day, @philip_or_flop decided to #BuildThanks by doing a little labor for his neighbors, the Lawrences. Philip describes Brandon as the hardest working person he knows and the hero who taught Philip many of the DIY skills you see on his feed today. Brandon has been in intensive therapy since a boating accident last year, so Philip wanted to transform the front porch into a refuge for the Lawrences to unwind. By adding a ramp with an inlaid welcome mat + a DIY swing and fountain, the couple is now able to enjoy the peaceful nights on the front porch together for the first time in two years.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#LaborDay #DoGood #Neighbor #Neighborly #ActsOfKindness #LowesGoals #DIY #FrontPorch #Fall'

b'@jennasuedesign \xe2\x80\x98s #DIFY bathroom transformation turned a gorgeous and modern after photo into a tender "after the after" moment full of rubber duckies, bubbles and quality time with her little one. Show us your "after the after" with #DIFY!'

b"A few weeks into the pandemic, eight-year-old Jurnee started to really miss her friends. She decided to set up a lemonade stand in her neighborhood to see some friendly faces and it soon became a huge hit! We bought more than 225 pints of her lemonade to help her local store celebrate #NationalLemonadeDay + surprised her with branded gear to help her grow her business. When life handed Jurnee lemons, she brought us all the best #lemonade. :lemon: Congrats Jurnee - we're big fans of Squeeze the Juice!"

b'Andarrio Johnson is a Charlotte, N.C., small business owner and chef whose catering business, along with many other small businesses, found itself in a state of recovery from COVID-19. As more and more weddings and corporate events were canceled, Andarrio pivoted to working as a personal chef to help sustain his business while currently sharing a kitchen space. And although his business was under duress due to the pandemic, he still made time to provide free grab and go lunches for local children. Andarrio applied and was awarded one of our small business grants, and now has plans to buy his own kitchen facility and hire an employee!\xe2\x80\x8b\n.\xe2\x80\x8b\nLearn more about our $55 million grant program and apply through our partner @LISC_HQ. Link in bio.'
b"Beat the heat and celebrate #NationalIceCreamDay with homemade ice cream made from your very own Lowe's bucket! #LowesGoals"

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWe cannot solve this need alone, and I encourage other companies to step up and make a difference in supporting small businesses, which are the cornerstone of our economy. Together, we can make a meaningful difference, especially for those in historically disinvested communities and areas hit hardest by COVID-19.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Marvin R. Ellison, President and CEO. Learn more about our small business grant program and apply through our partner @LISC_HQ at the link in our bio!'

b'At Lowe\xe2\x80\x99s, we are committed to fostering an environment where all individuals are safe, valued, respected and treated fairly. We are a business that helps make homes better \xe2\x80\x93 and the true concept of home extends beyond our walls and into our neighborhoods and communities, both online and offline. 
 
That\xe2\x80\x99s why we are a founding partner of the Black Information Network (BIN). This network will provide trusted, authentic information and dialogue that combats racism and discrimination through understanding. 
 
This is just one part of our commitment to connect to all of the communities we serve and provide meaningful actions that can make a lasting difference.'

b'Rob Kenney of @dadhowdoi captured our hearts with his videos teaching new skills to those who may not have someone to ask, "Dad, how do I?" \xe2\x80\x8b\n\nWe teamed up with him to celebrate dads DIYing projects to keep their families smiling at home, but first we had a very special Father\'s Day gift just for Rob. Help us celebrate all the DIY dads out there by sharing their creations using #DadBuiltThis. Who knows? We may just have a surprise for your dad too. :winking_face:'

b"It's not an easy task to get the kids outside and off their screens, especially when you don't have anything to inspire the fun. This #TransformationTuesday, we'll see how @monicamangin transformed an outdoor space into a creative playroom with unique storage options to keep the fun outside.\xe2\x80\x8b
.\xe2\x80\x8b
We've outlined a project for your own transformation below, but you'll have to head over to stories for the full how-to video. Check back next week for a new #TransformationTuesday project and don't forget to show us how you\xe2\x80\x99re making your space work for you during this time by using #HomeBecomes.\xe2\x80\x8b
.\xe2\x80\x8b
S T U M P \xc2\xa0S T E P P I N G \xc2\xa0S T O N E S\xe2\x80\x8b
Materials: Exterior paint (color pallet of your choice), paint brushes, log stumps\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Let your kids in on the fun and have them help you choose the colors. Samples sizes are an affordable way to paint the rainbow!\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2: Paint one side of the stump at a time.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_3: Allow time to dry before laying the stumps in a pattern of your choosing."

b"Finding a dedicated workspace for your kids + a home for all their school and art supplies can be tricky. This #TransformationTuesday, we'll see how @monicamangin transformed her kid's closet into a fun workspace that also features plenty of smart and stylish storage options for all their materials. \xe2\x80\x8b

.\xe2\x80\x8b
F A U X\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0B R I C K\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0W A L L P A P E R\xe2\x80\x8b
Materials: Peel and stick wallpaper, spray paint (color pallet of your choice), sponges\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Measure and apply the wallpaper, making sure to align the design at seams while applying.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2: Cut the sponges to match the width of the bricks on the wallpaper\xe2\x80\x8b.
:keycap_3: Use one sponge for each paint color. Spray one side with paint and apply to the bricks on your wallpaper in the desired pattern of your choice."

b"We could all use a quiet corner to sit down and relax with a good book, so for this #TransformationTuesday we\xe2\x80\x99re showing you how @monicamangin transformed a corner of her home into the perfect reading nook!\xe2\x80\x8b
.\xe2\x80\x8b
Check out instructions for tackling your own colorful book transformation below and come back next week for a new #TransformationTuesday project. Don't forget to show us how you\xe2\x80\x99re making your space work for you during this time by using #HomeBecomes.\xe2\x80\x8b
.\xe2\x80\x8b
C O L O R\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0B L O C K\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0B O O K S\xe2\x80\x8b
Materials: spray paint (color palette of your choice), old books (ones that you still want to keep and read!)\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Group books into separate stacks for each color in your palette.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2: Spray paint one stack at a time with the pages facing you and keeping the books closed.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_3: Allow time to dry before arranging books to create a rainbow gradient."

b"They say a picture is worth a thousand words, but we\xe2\x80\x99re not quite sure that covers it. Like when Ryan McKinney drove three hours each way to hand-deliver flowers to the mothers and grandmothers quarantining in Silver Pines Nursing and Rehabilitation Center for Mother's Day. \nWe\xe2\x80\x99re honored team members like Ryan were able to #buildthanks and surprise more than 100,000 moms in senior housing with flowers we donated using our network of small business growers. We hope these mothers who may be celebrating apart from their families feel the unconditional love and support they deserve. Happy Mother's Day!"

b'Ms. Louise is a greeter at our South End store in Charlotte, N.C. When you walk through the sliding doors, she\xe2\x80\x99s always there to greet you with a big smile and warm hello. She\xe2\x80\x99s a local celebrity and has been dearly missed while isolating in her senior living facility.

That\xe2\x80\x99s why a surprise flower delivery to Ms. Louise was so special to us. She makes sure every person who enters Lowe\xe2\x80\x99s feels seen and appreciated, and the least we could do was make Ms. Louise feel the same this Mother\xe2\x80\x99s Day. #buildthanks .
.
.
.
#mothersday #lowes #surprise'

b'With families celebrating Mother\xe2\x80\x99s Day a bit differently this year, we partnered with our small business growers and @uber to deliver $1M worth of flowers to 100,000+ moms in senior housing. Learn more at the link in our bio + follow along this week to help us celebrate these moms! #mothersday #buildthanks'

b"Are you a fan of the open shelf trend but looking for a cozier, farmhouse look? @thewhitebuffalostylingco 's upper cabinet refresh may be for you. :up_arrow_selector:\xe2\x80\x8b

b"It can be hard to stay motivated when you\xe2\x80\x99re trying to work out next to your couch, so for this #TransformationTuesday we\xe2\x80\x99re showing you how @monicamangin transformed a basement into an amazing home gym!\xe2\x80\x8b
.
We've outlined two projects for your own transformation below, but you'll have to head over to stories for the full how-to video. Check back next week for a new #TransformationTuesday project and don't forget to show us how you\xe2\x80\x99re making your space work for you during this time by using #HomeBecomes.\xe2\x80\x8b
.
P A R A L L E T T E S\xe2\x80\x8b
Materials: PVC pipes (8 small length, 4 medium length, 2 long length), 4 elbow joints, 4 tee joints, 8 PVC caps\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Attach an elbow joint to the end of both long PVC pieces.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2: Attach elbow joints to the end of each medium piece. Repeat by adding a tee joint to those sam e ends.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_3: Finish the feet by adding the small pieces to each tee joint.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_4: Complete your parallettes by adding caps to the end of each foot.\xe2\x80\x8b
.
W A L L \xc2\xa0O R G A N I Z E R\xe2\x80\x8b
Materials: slatwall panel, slawall basket, slat wall multipurpose hooks, wire shelf, power drill, screws, wall anchors (if necessary), level\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Create contrast and personalize your home gym by spray painting slatwall pieces before installation.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2: Mark the placement of slatwall panels on the wall while also looking for and marking studs.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_3: Install the panels using your marks as a guide.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_4: Add baskets, shelves, and hooks to the panels in a configuration th\xe2\x80\x8bat best works for you."

b"Many of us have tried working from home in our bedrooms, on the couch, or even at the kitchen table and let's be honest, it can get old having to set up and break down once you're ready for bed or it's time for dinner. Having a dedicated workspace can be a gamechanger in productivity while we're at home, and this #TransformationTuesday we're showing you how @MonicaMangin changed an empty corner into a bright home office space.\xe2\x80\x8b
.
We've outlined two projects for your own transformation below, but you'll have to head over to stories for the full how-to video! Check back next week for a new #TransformationTuesday project and don't forget to show us how you\xe2\x80\x99re making your space work for you during this time by using #HomeBecomes.\xe2\x80\x8b
.
R A I N B O W\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0M U R A L\xe2\x80\x8b
Materials: yard stick, chalk, tape, paint, 4 in. paint roller, paint brush\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Tape each piece of chalk to your yard stick every 8 inches. This will be used to trace the lines of your rainbow on the wall.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2: Trace the original lines with more chalk to make a more defined pattern.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_3: Use a small paint roller to bring the rainbow to life.\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_4: After the first layer is dry, touch up with a brush for clean lines on your mural.\xe2\x80\x8b
.
C O N V E R T I B L E\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0D E S K
Materials: upright wall shelving, brackets, wood project panel, power drill, screws, wall anchors (if necessary), level\xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1: Spray paint the shelving pieces to match the color palette of your mural. While that\xe2\x80\x99s drying, use the level to create guidelines for your shelving on the wall, making sure to mark the location of the studs.
:keycap_2: Drill each upright piece to the wall. Make sure to use wall anchors to attach each upright piece if you couldn't find the studs.
:keycap_3: Install each bracket to the appropriate height to accommodate either a sitting or standing desk. Lay the wood panel over the brackets for your desk.
:keycap_4: Add more brackets and wood panel pieces to create shelves for storage and d\xc3\xa9cor."

b"We're ending the week on a bright note with a colorful #BuildThanks how-to from @diyplaybook! :rainbow:\xe2\x80\x8b\xe2\x80\x8b \xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
:keycap_1:: Use materials you already have at home for the paper chains and light up letters: colorful construction paper, scissors, tape/a stapler, string, string lights, and styrofoam, cardboard, or wood (anything you can cut and hang at home).\xe2\x80\x8b\xe2\x81\xa3
:keycap_2:: Cut construction paper into thin strips and tape each end together to make a link. Repeat with remaining strips until you\xe2\x80\x99ve reached your desired length. Tape each paper chain to the top of your windowsill (make sure to leave space for your message).\xe2\x81\xa3
:keycap_3:: Write your letters and cut them from a large block of Styrofoam. Wrap string lights around them to add some glow and hang from the top of your windowsill using string extension cord to plug in your lights! And there you have it!\xe2\x81\xa3
\xe2\x81\xa3
Continue tagging us in your DIY thank you messages and we'll keep sharing the positivity."

b'Artisans, makers and craftspeople took #BuildThanks to new heights, using their skills to make amazing signs of hope for essential workers. @angelarosehome created an 8-ft interactive sign to show her appreciation for frontline workers. \xe2\x80\x8b
\xe2\x80\xa2
Here\xe2\x80\x99s how you could create your own: \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_1:: Use spare Eucaboard or plywood and paint surface with chalk paint; Let it dry overnight. \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_2:: Screw surface to a frame made from 2x4s (8 ft x 8 ft). \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_3:: Grab scrap plastic and cut down strips to 4 ft long. \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_4:: Using a straight edge, draw lines to make the heart shape and cut with a jigsaw. \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_5:: Insert plastic strips into the cuts on the surface. \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_6:: Stencil \xe2\x80\x9cThank You\xe2\x80\x9d using a pencil, marker, etc. and paint the letters white. \xe2\x80\x8b
:keycap_7:: Grab some chalk and write kind messages to frontline workers! \xe2\x80\x8b
\xe2\x80\xa2
For more #BuildThanks project inspiration to take to your shop, head over to our stories! .
.
.
.
#lowes #diy #makers'

b'There\xe2\x80\x99s still time to join us to #BuildThanks for all our frontline heroes, our more than 300,000 associates, and all of you doing your part at home. Simply use items around the house to make a DIY creation expressing gratitude and display it for everyone to see. Let\xe2\x80\x99s #BuildThanks together.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve loved seeing families participate in #BuildThanks by crafting thank you messages with their children for frontline workers. @thegritandpolish created a show-stopping rainbow that spanned multiple windows.
\xe2\x80\xa2
Here\xe2\x80\x99s how you can create your own: 
:keycap_1:: Grab some banner material you have lying around the house. This can be anything you have: think printer paper, old bedsheets, etc. and measure/cut to your desired size.
:keycap_2:: Use a pencil or marker to create a stripe template by drawing 2-inch parallel lines. 
:keycap_3:: Have your kids join in and paint the stripes all different colors! This can be a traditional rainbow, or just use any paint colors you have at your house. 
:keycap_4:: Once dry, hang your display with tape on any and all windows in your home to brighten the day of everyone who passes.
\xe2\x80\xa2
For more #BuildThanks project inspiration for the whole family, head over to our stories!
.
.
.
.
#lowes #diy #kidsproject #rainbow'
